title: Research Media Partnership Opportunities
description: A media planner is looking for relevant online publications or blogs to partner with for sponsored content.

tasks.description: Identify the target audience's interests and media consumption habits.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent understands what kind of content the audience reads.

tasks.description: Search for blogs and online magazines that cater to this audience and accept sponsored posts.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a list of 5-10 potential media partners.

tasks.description: For each potential partner, find their media kit or contact information for advertising inquiries.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gathers the necessary information to initiate outreach.
